Package com.example.atheneum.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CameraHandler.OnPictureTakenListener
    Provides an interface of callback(s) for handling events from the CameraHandler
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AvailableBookAdapter
    The Available book adapter.
    BookRequestViewHolder
    To hold all requests on a book
    CameraHandler<T>
    Handles requests to the external camera and provides callbacks to handle the result of these requests.
    ConnectionChecker
    Class for checking whether or not device is connected to the internet.
    EditTextWithValidator
    Small class to aggregate an EditText with a TextValidator to allow manually calling the validator when needed, ie.
    EmailValidator
    Does checking of emails for validity
    FirebaseAuthUtils
    Utility class to reduce boilerplate code for dealing with FirebaseAuth
    FirebaseQueryLiveData
    Provides a LiveData wrapper for a DataSnapshot obtained from a Firebase Query
    GoodreadsReviewAdapter
    Adapter class for converting the XML response from goodreads into a GoodreadsReveiwInfo Object.
    GoogleMapConstants
    The Google map constants utility class holds constants used for Google Map API
    NonEmptyTextValidator
    Checks if an field is empty and displays a warning
    NotificationIntentProvider
    The Notification intent provider.
    OwnerBooksAdapter
    Bind Measurements to OwnerBooksRecyclerView in MainActivity
    OwnerBooksAdapter.MeasurementViewHolder
    The books view holder.
    PhotoUtils
    Does encoding and decoding for photo bitmaps
    SwipeToDeleteCallback
    Callback for swiping items to delete in a RecyclerView Used in NotificationsActivity
    TextValidator
    Class that is used to validate changes to a TextView as the text within the TextView changes.
